title: Victoria Sponge Sandwich
ingredients: ['Sponge cake', '100g (4 oz) caster sugar', '100g (4 oz) butter or margarine', '100g (4 oz) plain flour', '2 medium eggs', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest or a few drops of vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon baking soda (optional)', 'Filling', 'fruit preserves or whipped cream']
